partnerDetails.about:
BGEN provide multi-disciplinary engineering solutions from front-end design and consultancy through to construction, commissioning, validation and ongoing maintenance services. Your project is our passion and we combine innovative design and engineering excellence to provide a fully integrated solution tailored to your needs. Our approach is to listen carefully and think creatively and we aim to add value to your project and your business. Sectors: Pharmaceutical, Nuclear, Chemical/Petrochemical, Oil and Gas, Power and Energy, Water and Utilities, Consumer Goods, Metals, Electric Vehicle Charging Points.
Services: Engineering, Design and Project management, Electrical, Instrumentation and Control, Mechanical, Technology, Maintenance and asset care, Sophisticated environments, Nuclear, International.
